Housing Houses in Munich Make your house search as easy as possible Furnished Apartments Still without a flat? Equipped apartments may be the solution Moving Some checklists and tips to make moving as easy as possible Munich lifestyle Classic beer gardens in Munich You have to visit these beer gardens Viktualienmarkt Fruits, vegetables and foods - what the market has to offer About the Bavarian cuisine Get to know the Bavarian cuisine - a selection More Child Care in Munich Information on Kindergarten, Krippe and Horte Studying in Munich Excellent universities and colleges Telephone & internet M-Net is the regional partner (in German) English language services Information for English speakers in Munich Munich jobs Find out which employers are hiring Public authorities Find out more information about public offices Fliegender Brief muenchen.de als Newsletter! Mit aktuellen Highlights, Tipps und Infos. E-Mail Adresse Rechtsgrundlage für die Verarbeitung Eurer E-Mail Adresse ist Art. 6 Abs. 1 a) DSGVO in Verbindung mit Eurer Einwilligung. Ihr könnte Eure Einwilligung jederzeit mit Wirkung für die Zukunft widerrufen, am Einfachsten durch Anklicken des Abmeldelinks am Ende des entsprechenden E-Mail-Newsletters.
